display_long_description:
A free pixel-style platformer that combines **pet collecting, resource mining, horror chase, and pet training**. Experience thrilling monster hunts, discover mysterious pet eggs, mine rare resources, fight bosses, and raise powerful companions for intense pet battles! 

 📢 Join Discord: https://discord.gg/lavr (Lethal Animal vr)
# 🥚 Pet Raising – From Egg to Battle Partner
**Hatch** mysterious eggs at your base to grow adorable pets. Each pet has **unique skills**—soaring aerial strikes, lightning-fast dodges, or devastating BOSS counters. **Feed, train, and evolve** your companions to unlock their potential[media]
# ⛏️ Mining Adventure – Gather & Upgrade
Venture deep into dungeons to **mine** precious ores and rare stuff. Use resources to **upgrade weapons and gear**: swing across gaps with a **grapple hook**, or eat **chili peppers** to breathe fire on enemies. Get stronger to survive the chaos!
[media]
# 🏃‍♂️Horror Chase – dodge the monster look for eggs !
Dash through mazes while terrifying monsters are on your tail. One wrong move means death! Collect rare **pet eggs** hidden in dangerous areas— the scarier the place, the rarer the reward.[media]


# ⚔️ Pet PvP Battles
Test your pets in dangerous dungeons, claim rare loot, or enter **pet PvP arenas** against other players. Show off your ultimate training and dominate![media]
# ✨Key Features:
- Mining & Treasure Hunting
- PvP Brawls
- Tech Tree Unlocks
- Forge System
- Customization: Animal Avatars
